segments.advisor_message: So, just to clarify, are you currently self-employed, or have you taken a job recently?
segments.client_message: Well, I, uh, I thought I was self-employed, but actually I just started working full-time for a company last month. My employment started in September, I think?

segments.advisor_message: Got it, thanks for that update. And you mentioned you were planning to retire at 65? Is that still the case?
segments.client_message: Actually, I changed my mind about that. I think I'd prefer to retire a bit earlier, maybe at 62 instead. Just feels better to me now.
